body.name: UMIDIGI Unlocked Cell Phones 2023, C1 Max Android 12 Smartphone,6GB+128GB,50MP Camera 5150mAh Battery 4G Dual SIM Fingerprint and Face Unlock Global Bands Cell Phone for All Major Carriers,Warranty
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 3 hrs 36 mins
features: 【6GB+128GB & Android 12 phone】UMIDIGI C1 Max cell phone is powered by Unisoc T610 and has an AnTuTu Benchmark Score of over 220,534. 6GB memory and 128GB storage, expandable up to 256GB with an optional microSD card. C1 Max Smartphone works well for watching videos, playing music, e-books, and taking photos. The smartphone runs on the latest Android 12, which is up to 30% faster than the previous version, and has a longer battery life.

【6.52" HD large screen & 50MP+2MP+8MP cameras】UMIDIGI C1 Max android smartphone is equipped with 50MP main camera, 8MP front camera and 2MP depth camera. Record the beautiful moments in your life anytime and anywhere, so they can become precious memories during your growth.And night mode outstandingly record every frame of the wonderful night scene.The 6.52" large screen with 1650x720px resolution and 20:9 notched aspect ratio provides a wider view and comfortable operation.

【High capacity 5150mAh & thin and light smartphone】UMIDIGI C1 Max phone is equipped with a 5150mAh ultra high capacity battery, so you don't have to worry about running out of battery when traveling or doing outdoor sports. The android 12 phone is thin and light while having a high capacity battery. The body of this phone is 8.75mm thin and weighs only 192g. The cell phone has an earphone jack and a USB Type-C connection. UMIDIGI C1 Max is ideal for on-the-go use.

【Dual SIM & Other Convenient Features】The unlocked phone has two card slots, so you can insert two different Nano sim cards and use both from the same phone. Alternatively, you can insert one Nano sim card and one MicroSD card. Moreover, unlocked android phones is equipped with fingerprint recognition, face recognition, and GPS. You can check real-time information such as altitude, pressure, direction and location anywhere.

【Global Bands & 1-year warranty】UMIDIGI C1 Max Smartphone support global bands and fits all major carriers in Canada. UMIDIGI is a brand that focuses on product performance, design, quality, and service.We offer 100% one year service. If you have any problems, please feel free to email us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget phone
reviews.reviewText: Great specs for the price you pay. The phone is easy to hold on to and has a nice feeling to it. Camera quality is good. Surprised with the features it has for only $140. The fingerprint scanner works very well and even the face id unlock feature is good. Phone is fast and reliable with the included 6gb of ram and 128gb of storage you can have lots of apps and photos on it no problem. Overall phone is worth the price and look forward to using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I not use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible charging ports!!
reviews.reviewText: Screen quality is ok, as is software. The charging ports (or maybe it's the cords) are HORRIBLE! The connector came right out of mine within DAYS. Got a second one and SAME! Horrible first time with this brand, don't know if I'll ever go back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You can hardly hear those sound on this device :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Phone kept restarting
reviews.reviewText: So the phone does look nice and we were super excited to receive it. It powered on and we were able to set it up. The issue appeared when opening applications. The phone would just turn off. Resetting from settings didn’t fix the issue so we returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken charge port
reviews.reviewText: I only bought it 3 months ago and the charge port broke and I'm having trouble getting a warranty replacement. It worked good until it broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This phone sucks .....Why purchase a phone that you cannot talk on
reviews.reviewText: I like this cell phone. But the main purpose for buying it is to talk on. I cannot use because everyone sounds like they are under water or you can only here half of what they are saying. And then they continue to say "What" "What" "I can't here you 🙄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a phone from Umidigi in July and they had no issue taking my money. The problem is that they never sent me a phone and refuse to answer my inquiries. Also, when attempting to contact them via other means than their help page, they blocked me and stopped me from contacting them. They simply stole my money. DO NOT BUY FROM UMIDIGI OR ANY OF THEIR PRODUCTS. THEY ARE A TERRIBLE SCAM COMPANY

reviews.reviewTitle: Hassle free experience on a budget
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes I wonder how low can you in the Android world while still having a decent hassle free experience, well I still don't know, but certainly the Umidigi C1 Max is both cheap and very capable. I got this as a back up phone and I am very happy with it. With a lot of storage and a micro SD slot, I don't have to worry about storing music, videos and games. The screen is only HD, but fortunately is of a very high quality in every other aspect, no light bleeding in the corners, very bright during sunny days and fluid and consistent playback for videos and movies. The build quality is pleasant, durable and comfortable to hold. Battery life goes for two days easily. The system has no bugs or quirks, everything just works, data, Bluetooth, WiFi, GPS, fingerprint scanner, no need to thinkering with anything. It's unlocked to be use with any wireless provider in Canada, no issues there. It comes with a clean/stock Android 12 rom, and the CPU is very capable for everyday use, streaming, background playback, web browsing, instant messaging, even light and casual gaming, no short comings there. Despite the big battery and large screen, the C1 Max doesn't feel unwieldy, the slim profile helps, even with the included plastic case, plus you get the secure grip and protection. Then there's the cameras, the obvious concern for a budget phone. Daytime photo quality is acceptable, considering for how much it goes and HDR can help with some harsh light conditions, and selfies look fine. Even the low light photography is reasonable, the sore point is the video it's a bit jerky and it doesn't have any image stabilisation, it could be added through a system update (the option is there) but as for now, unless you are standing still, video is very jumpy and not very usable, image clarity is there, but with no EIS. Not much else, I do feel this is a bargain considering all the positive and specially that everything just work out of the box, with a recent and bug free system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: RETOUR GEZONDEN! Toestel start uit zichzelf op willekeurige momenten opnieuw op!
reviews.reviewText: Ik heb de G1 Max, waar ik uiterst tevreden over ben, en dacht dat ook te zijn met deze C1Max.Het toestel ziet er goed uit, en is goed gefabriceerd, maar er is iets mis, met mijn exemplaar tenminste, omdat het toestel vanaf het begin, al tijdens de begin installatie, uit zichzelf opnieuw opstart. En dit gebeurt op willekeurige momenten, in willekeurige apps, licht of zwaar in geheugen gebruik. Hierdoor is het niet betrouwbaar, en zeker niet te gebruiken! Dus, ik stuur het retour, en bestel nog een G1Max, waar ik zeer tevreden over ben. Misschien is dit een uitzondering, maar denk hier aan als je over gaat tot bestellen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought this budget phone to replace my old and slow mobile. I have been using Umidigi products for many years and didn’t let me down. So I decided to buy the phone again.Unboxed, cable, charger and a case are included. A protective screen was pre-installed. Turned on the phone and was roughly already 70% charged. The screen is bright and clear. It is only 700px but the display is sharp and clear enough. Take a bit of time to set up the phone as I have 82 apps to be installed 😛. Surprisingly, it is much faster than my old laggy phone. All Bluetooth, wifi & mobile connections were tested and worked perfectly. Both cameras are surprisingly good quality for a budget phone. Decent sound quality but it is better than my tablet’s. I fully charged it in the morning and it still had more than 60% battery left at night. One charge can last for 2 days at least in general usage. I like the fingerprint sensor on the power button. It’s more convenient than that at the back.Android 12 was preinstalled and I need time to get used to it. It claims it has a 50MP camera but I doubt it may be only 13MP as I can’t distinguish the difference between 13MP & 50MP photos. It doesn’t have a wide angle and close-up cams. No complaint as it is just a budget phone. It is a Dual-SIM phone but you need to sacrifice the SD slot.Having used it for nearly a week. So far it doesn’t disappoint me. The performance is higher than I expected on a budget phone. I’m considering buying one (or another higher model from Umidigi) for my wife. 😉
Pas top du tout avec Messenger on entend rien très déçu

reviews.reviewTitle: Das UMIDIGI C1 Max Smartphone ist vom Preisleistungsverhältnis einfach TOP.
reviews.reviewText: Auf der suche nach einem günstigen aber technisch für diese Preisklasse gut ausgestatteten Smartphone für ein Familienmitglied, bin ich auf das UMIDIGI C1 Max gestoßen. Der Hersteller UMIDIGI wird wohl hier zu Lande nicht sehr bekannt sein, ich habe mich jedoch dazu entschieden dieses Smartphone zu nehmen und es ist wirklich begeisternd.* Das Smartphone wurde über Amazon Prime wie immer schnell geliefert.* Es war sicher und gut verpackt. Das Design ist schlicht aber solide* Überzeugt hat mich aufjedenfall der Lieferumfang, hierbei ist ein Ladegerät vorhanden, sowie eine angebrachte Display-Schutzfolie und eine Durchsichtige Schutzhülle. All das ist für diese Preisklasse mehr als Fair vom Hersteller. Bei den großen Playern im Markt ist dies ja leider nicht mehr üblich.* Optisch sieht das Smartphone edel und hochwertig aus.Mit Android 12 und dem Unisoc Octacore Prozessor ist das Smartphone sehr flott unterwegs, hierbei muss man aber auch fairerweise sagen das es keine Ultra-Gamingmaschine ist :) Ich denke aber alle altäglichen Aufgaben sollte dieses Smartphone jedoch meistern können.Auf der Speicherseite sind 128GB interner Speicher und 6GB Arbeitsspeicher sind für diesen Preis sehr gut. Der Speicher ist hierbei sehr Peformant, was mich positiv überrascht hat. Eine Erweiterung des Speichers ist mit einer Micro-SD Karte möglich, ich persönlich bin kein großer Fan von SD-Karten im Smartphone, da es in der Vergangenheit immer wieder zu problem kam mit den SD-Karten, unabhängig vom verwendeten Smartphone. Wer also auf viel internen Speicher setzen will oder sogar muss, der sollte sich nach einem anderen Model umschauen.Das Display hat eine gute helligkeit ist aber sicherlich mit keinem FULL-HD Display vergleichbar, auch hier sollte das HD+ Display für viele Anwender jedoch ausreichend sein. Hätte dieses Smartphone ein FULL-HD Display, wäre es der totale Preis/Leistungskracher :)Die Anbindung im WLAN ist einfach und läuft sehr flott auch die 4G Nutzung ist gut und man kommt unterwegs ohne Probleme durch den Altag.Die akkuleistung ist solide und man kommt entspannt einen guten Tag ohne Steckdose mit dem Smartphome aus, hier ist der Verwendungszweck eines jeden Anwenders unterschiedlich und so kann die Akkudauer sicherlich bei jedem einzelnen anders ausfallen.Ob ein Update auf Android 13 folgen wird, hängt jetzt sicherlich am Hersteller UMDIGI.Mein Fazit:Das Smartphone erhält von mir 5 Sterne, weil es mich einfach im Gesamtpaket überzeugt hat und ich würde in dieser Preisklasse immer wieder zu dem UMIDIGI C1 Max greifen. Wer also ein günstiges und solides Smartphone für ein kleines Budget sucht, erhält hiermit und gutes Gerät.Würde der Hersteller UMIDIGI ein FULL-HD Display einbauen in dieser Preisklasse, dann wäre dieses Smartphone einfach ein TOP einsteiger bis sogar untere Mittelklasse Smartphone :)Weniger lesen
